data.title: TZP Group
data.text:
Paul Davis

PARTNER

Paul Davis joined TZP Group in August 2008. Paul began his career in 2002 as a Financial Analyst in the Investment Banking Division of Citigroup Inc., where, during his tenure, he worked on numerous M&A and financing transactions. In 2004, he joined the corporate strategic planning department of The Walt Disney Company as a Senior Analyst. Paul serves as a member of the Boards of Directors of Dwellworks Investors, LLC, Pyramid Management Holdings, LLC, Evergent Technologies, Inc., and ATS Parent, LLC.

Paul received his B.B.A. in Finance and Accounting from the University of Michigan in 2002 and his M.B.A. from Harvard Business School in 2008.
